name: Darby's Field Forge
flavor: Focus heat into a small area.

purposeDescriptions.low: very gradually pulls heat from nearby environment into the affected area
purposeDescriptions.mid: rapidly pulls heat from the nearby environment into the affected area
purposeDescriptions.high: instantly cooks the affected area and flash-freezes the nearby environment
purposeDescriptions.invLow: gradually freezes the affected area, warming the nearby environment
purposeDescriptions.invMid: rapidly cools the affected area, pushing the heat out into the nearby environment
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: flash-freezes the affected area, singing the nearby environment with the displaced heat
